title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Automating enterprise-scale code modernization with agentic AI (MAM342)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用智能体AI自动化企业级代码现代化 (MAM342)
abstract: Discover how AI agents are revolutionizing enterprise-scale code modernization initiatives. This session demonstrates how to accelerate your modernization journey through agentic AI-driven code transformations. You'll learn practical strategies for defining custom code transformations, setting up transformation campaigns, managing multi-repository migrations, and measuring success. Featured customer success journeys from industry leaders will showcase language migrations and framework upgrades, providing actionable insights for your own modernization projects.
abstract_cn: 探索AI代理如何革命性地改变企业级代码现代化计划。本次会议演示如何通过代理AI驱动的代码转换加速您的现代化进程。您将学习定义自定义代码转换的实用策略、设置转换活动、管理多仓库迁移以及衡量成功。来自行业领导者的特色客户成功案例将展示语言迁移和框架升级，为您自己的现代化项目提供可操作的见解。

presenter.name: Morgan Lunt
presenter.title: Senior Product Manager - Technical, External Services
